Discharges for Alienage
If there was a discharge during a period of hostilities that was not changed to honorable prior to January 7, 1957, determine if the records show that the former service member requested the discharge as provided in the table below.
If the record …

Note
:  The lack of affirmative evidence in the service department’s reply or in the eFolder showing that the former service member requested the release is a sufficient basis for a favorable decision.
